analysis.description:
ICO.request_dividend (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#1244-1262) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- token_holder.send(holder_profit) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#1262)
usingOraclize.getCodeSize (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#546-549) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in ICO.fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#1153-1207):
	External calls:
	- ID = oraclize_query(URL,json(https://min-api.cryptocompare.com/data/price?fsym=ETH&tsyms=USD).USD) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#1167-1174)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- userAddress (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#1176-1178)
	- userqueryID (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#1180)
	- uservalue (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#1178-1180)

Reentrancy in usingOraclize.oraclize_newRandomDSQuery (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#779-803):
	External calls:
	- sessionKeyHash_bytes32 = oraclize_randomDS_getSessionPubKeyHash() (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#785-788)
	- queryId = oraclize_query(_delay,random,args,_customGasLimit) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#799-801)
	External calls sending eth:
	- queryId = oraclize_query(_delay,random,args,_customGasLimit) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#799-801)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- oraclize_network_name (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#799-801)
	- oraclize_randomDS_args (/unique_chucks/4/0x1bcbc54166f6ba149934870b60506199b6c9db6d.sol#801-803)
